overview:
TPAYmobile is an advanced solution for software license management and on-device payment for mobile software applications and content. It gives you a seamless integration of digital rights management and on-device payment, which makes the content purchase highly intuitive and simple. All you need to do is integrate TPAYmobile with your application and you are ready to go.

Some of the key highlights of TPAYmobile are:

Global On-Device Payments & Coverage -TPAYmobile works on over 100 mobile networks and over 160 countries. Payment can be made via Master Card, Visa, Diners etc. You name it..TPAYmobile has it!

Create a Business Model - Select from numerous business plans to suit your application; let your users decide how they want to access and pay for your app, be it weekly, daily or monthly. Flexibility is the name of the game.

Absolutely No Usage / Starter Fee - With TPAYmobile, you don’t need any signup/starter fee whatsoever. Just a few clicks, and you are ready to receive payments for your application.

Tried & Tested - TPAYmobile is embedded in over 230 million Nokia and other handsets. It is used by leading ISV’s like Symantec, Cisco, F-Secure, 3D Arts, Nokia Maps and many others.

Sales Tracking - We let you monitor your app’s performance. This is not just about getting payments, it’s about monitoring your performance and developing a business plan based on your business requirements. We’ll provide you with a dashboard you can track on a daily basis.

Super Easy & Smooth Integration - Our APIs allow you to integrate your application easily. Just plug-and-play and see the difference!

Instant Activation - No waiting period, no pending approvals or overly long verification periods! All it takes is 15 mins for you to get up and running with your application!
